typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		nameId as string,
		Name as string,
		Country as string,
		DepId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Countrynew = iif(isNull(Country), 'UnKnown', upper(Country))) ~> DerivedColumn1
